text: Ned Franklin Garver (December 25, 1925 â€“ February 26, 2017) was an American professional baseball player. He played as a pitcher in Major League Baseball (MLB) from 1948 to 1961. He played for St. Louis Browns, Detroit Tigers, Kansas City Athletics and Los Angeles Angels. He was born in Ney, Ohio. Garver died on February 26, 2017 in Bryan, Ohio, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1925 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Sportspeople from Ohio
title: Ned Garver
